formatting_rules.note: SMS limit is 1600 chars for concatenated messages. Aim for <500 per message.
formatting_rules.signature: Every message must end with 'Reply HELP anytime.'
formatting_rules.tone: Friendly, casual, helpful. Not corporate. Use contractions (we'll, you'll).
formatting_rules.links: Use full URLs (not shortened) for transparency

variable_formats.customer_names: First name only if available, otherwise 'this customer'
